name: mergeConfigs

type.rawType: <TModels extends import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/purpose/codebase-introspection/database/fs-orm/src/types").AnyModelObject>(modelName: Extract<keyof TObject, string>, dbConfig?: import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/purpose/codebase-introspection/database/fs-orm/src/types").DbConfig<TModels> | undefined, config?: import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/purpose/codebase-introspection/database/fs-orm/src/types").CustomQueryConfig | import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/purpose/codebase-introspection/database/fs-orm/src/types").GetQueryConfig<TModels[keyof TModels]> | undefined) => import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/purpose/codebase-introspection/database/fs-orm/src/types").MergedQueryConfig

value:
<TModels extends AnyModelObject>(
  modelName: Keys<TModels>,
  dbConfig?: DbConfig<TModels>,
  config?: CustomQueryConfig | GetQueryConfig<TModels[keyof TModels]>
) => {
  const hardcodedDefaultQueryConfig: QueryConfig = {
    dbStorageMethod: "jsonMultiple",
    // NB: this was hardcoded, but this is reducing performance a lot! Not sure why this was needed...
    // manualProjectRoot: getProjectRoot(),
  };

  const modelConfig = dbConfig?.modelQueryConfig?.[modelName];

  const mergedQueryConfig = mergeObjects<QueryConfig>(
    hardcodedDefaultQueryConfig,
    dbConfig?.defaultQueryConfig,
    modelConfig,
    config
  )!;

  // NB: dbStorageMethod is now always set
  const merged = {
    projectRoot: getProjectRoot(),
    ...mergedQueryConfig,
  } as MergedQueryConfig;
  return merged;
}
